org.treetank.api

Interface INodeReadTrx

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    INodeWriteTrx
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeReadTrx, NodeWriteTrx

    public interface INodeReadTrx

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close shared read transaction and immediately release all resources.
      INode getNode()
      Getting the current node.
      QName getQNameOfCurrentNode()
      Getting the name of a current node.
      String getTypeOfCurrentNode()
      Getting the type of the current node.

      Getting the value of the current node.
      boolean isClosed()
      Is this transaction closed?

      Move cursor to a node by its node key.

    • Method Detail

      • moveTo

        boolean moveTo(long pKey)
        Move cursor to a node by its node key.
        Parameters:
        pKey - Key of node to select.
        Returns:
        True if the node with the given node key is selected.

      • moveToAttribute

        boolean moveToAttribute(int pIndex)
        Move cursor to attribute by its index.
        Parameters:
        pIndex - Index of attribute to move to.
        Returns:
        True if the attribute node is selected.

      • moveToNamespace

        boolean moveToNamespace(int pIndex)
        Move cursor to namespace declaration by its index.
        Parameters:
        pIndex - Index of attribute to move to.
        Returns:
        True if the namespace node is selected.

      • getValueOfCurrentNode

        String getValueOfCurrentNode()
        Getting the value of the current node.
        Returns:
        the current value of the node

      • getQNameOfCurrentNode

        QName getQNameOfCurrentNode()
        Getting the name of a current node.
        Returns:
        the QName of the node

      • getTypeOfCurrentNode

        String getTypeOfCurrentNode()
        Getting the type of the current node.
        Returns:
        the normal type of the node

      • nameForKey

        String nameForKey(int pKey)
        Get name for key. This is used for efficient key testing.
        Parameters:
        pKey - Key, i.e., local part key, URI key, or prefix key.
        Returns:
        String containing name for given key.

      • getNode

        INode getNode()
        Getting the current node.
        Returns:
        the node

      • close

        void close()
           throws TTException
        Close shared read transaction and immediately release all resources. This is an idempotent operation and does nothing if the transaction is already closed.
        Throws:
        TTException - If can't close Read Transaction.

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Is this transaction closed?
        Returns:
        true if closed, false otherwise
